function.name: read_questions_file
function.description: Opens the questions.txt file and reads its content.

file_path.description: The path to the questions.txt file.

function.name: summarize_math_questions
function.description: Summarizes mathematical questions and their answers from a specified file.

file_path.description: The path to the file containing the mathematical questions and answers.

function.name: delete_file
function.description: Deletes the specified file from the system.

file_path.description: The path of the file to be deleted.
